title: Woman admits UK bitcoin fraud charges after ‘world’s largest’ crypto seizure
description: Zhimin Qian pleads guilty after wallets with 61,000 bitcoins, currently worth over £5bn, seized from north London home
content:
A woman has been convicted for her role in a multibillion-pound bitcoin fraud after what is thought to have been the world’s largest cryptocurrency seizure.
Zhimin Qian, also known as Yadi Zhang, 45, orchestrated a fraud in China between 2014 and 201... [2875 chars]

title: The countries where digital ID already exists
description: Sir Keir Starmer announced last week that all UK citizens are to have mandatory ID to prove their right to live and work in the country.
content:
As the UK gears up to make digital ID mandatory for all UK citizens, across the globe similar schemes already exist.

title: Enfield and Greenwich shortlisted for new towns
description: Crews Hill in Enfield and Thamesmead in Greenwich have been put forward for large-scale building.
content:

Gem O'ReillyLondon and

Two areas in London have been shortlisted for the construction of new towns under the housing secretary's plan to "get Britain building again".

title: Government under pressure as Labour members vote to accept Israel committing genocide in Gaza
description: Israel has repeatedly denied the genocide allegation and called a recent UN commission of inquiry report "distorted and false".
content:
Labour Party members have voted to accept that a genocide is taking place in Gaza by Israel - putting pressure on the government to also do so.
Members voted to approve an emergency motion at Labour's conference to accept the findings of the UN commi... [2399 chars]
